td.p: The tool bar lets you access the menu options user the most. The following lists the options available in the toolbar.
Note that while you are in combat, the Start button is replaced by the End button (see below).
Note that until you enter a combat, you cannot see the End button. Instead you will see the Start button (see above).

At the very bottom of the Turn Watcher™ window, you will find a status bar. It tells you what the last action was. This is quite practical when in combat since it also tells you the round number you are in.
Since all the actions are displayed there, the actions applied by the Undo and Redo options will appear as if you had applied the said action.
